org.modelio.api.ui.contributor

Interface IWizardContributor

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IDiagramWizardContributor
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDiagramWizardContributor, AbstractWizardContributor, GenericDiagramWizardContributor

    public interface IWizardContributor
    This is the contract to be honored by a contributor to the Creation Wizard.
    • Getters are used by the wizard to display information about the element to create
    • Setters are used to initialize the data structure when loading a module providing the contributor
    • The actionPerformed(ModelElement, String, String) method is in charge of creating the element from the provided data.
    Since:
    3.4.0

    • Method Detail

      • actionPerformed

        MObject actionPerformed(ModelElement context,
                        String name,
                        String description)
        Execute the creation action.
        Parameters:
        context - the model element on which the wizard is run
        name - the name of the element to create.
        description - the description of the element to create.
        Returns:
        the created model object.

      • getDetails

        String getDetails()
        Get a complete textual explanation of the contribution's role or function.
        Returns:
        the contribution's role or function.

      • getHelpUrl

        String getHelpUrl()
        Get a URL to some 'help' or 'documentation' page about the contribution.
        Returns:
        the help URL.

      • getIcon

        org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Image getIcon()
        Returns:
        the wizard small icon

      • getInformation

        String getInformation()
        Get a short textual explanation of the contribution's role or function.

        This text is displayed in the panel header.

        Returns:
        the short explanation.

      • getLabel

        String getLabel()
        Get the label to be displayed for the contribution by the Creation Wizard in the "type" browser.
        Returns:
        the label to be displayed

      • getModule

        IModule getModule()
        Returns:
        the module that contributed this contribution.

      • getPreviewImage

        org.eclipse.jface.resource.ImageDescriptor getPreviewImage()
        Returns:
        a preview image to display in the wizard.

        Returns:
        the scopes this wizard applies to

      • dispose

        void dispose()
        Release resources allocated by this contributor.

        Should for example dispose the icon allocated by getIcon() if any.
